EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-05-09-AWS-RI-Consumption.Sorry we missed you
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for {{my.Webinar Title:default=edit me}}.
If you were not able to attend, you can watch the webinar via our Turbonomic 6.1 On-Demand Webinar Center <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/6-1-video-content]]>.
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, please feel free to schedule a meeting <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo/]]> with us.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
